newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Trading of Shanghai Petro suspended.
newsitem.headline: Trading of Shanghai Petro suspended.

text.p: Trading in shares of Shanghai Petrochemical Co Ltd was suspended at the company's request pending an announcement, the Hong Kong stock exchange said on Friday.

Shanghai Petrochemical, which delayed a share placement plan last month, said earlier today it would place 500 million H shares, or 7.1 percent of the enlarged share capital, globally at HK$2.075 each with institutional and professional investors.
The company said it intended to use the net proceeds to finance, in part, capital expansion, and also for working capital.
Its shares rose HK$0.05 to end at HK$2.25 on Thursday.
